channel.title: Hi im new here and have a question
channel.description:
So I try to login, i've just started, I've pressed the start server and its says "The file is downloaded, you may login. Have fun!"
So I try that and it says connection error press the start server button to start. (I've already pressed it)
Whats happened? :eek:

item.title: Hi im new here and have a question
item.dc:creator: @pkaz_0wnt pkaz 0wnt
item.description:
@pkaz_0wnt wrote:

click start server then ok then login with a user name and password leave the ip as 127.0.0.1 and it should log u in to hybridscape[br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2007, 02:26:42 PM[/size][hr]go onto server advertisement or server status and get an IP adress for a server you want to play some servers also require you change port. in the IP bit underneath password type the IP of the server there or go to file>new server>paste/type ip there. to change a port go to file>new port>then type the port in. most servers are on port 43594 which is the default on the moparscape 3.2 w/ aryan client.

hope this helps.

Read full topic
item.source: Hi im new here and have a question
